summary:
Skyrim Facelifts: Followers FIERCE HOUSECARLS Edition
A facelift package for the Housecarls of Skyrim. Only the five vanilla so far; Hearthfire Housecarls tba.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][size=3]:UPDATE 9/30/2016:[/size][/u][/b]
A couple years late, but I'm going to be working on fixing up this mod (as well as my others) to rid it of all the errors that others had been reporting and maybe touch up the face lifts a bit to match a higher quality than the original files possessed.
I've already run the original files found here through TES5Edit to clean them up and for the most part, everything worked in my game. The only problems I found were with the Hearthfire Hoursecarls (Rayya, Validmar, and Gregor). Not sure why yet, but I'll try to get everything working to the best of my ability.
Thank you guys so much for your support. I never expected to get so many endoresements for my silly little mods. Hopefully I can get these facelifts up to a quality that is worthy of your time.
Thanks again!
~RavenSylphe
[center]______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/center]

[img]http://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/33961-1-1364317764.png[/img]
[heading] [center] [b] "As you will, my thane. I will protect you with my life." [/b] [/center] [/heading]
I originally started working on each housecarl, one by one, planning on releasing them individually, which I might still do, but after some thinking, I thought it might be a good idea to release them together in a package. With each housecarl, I tried to enhance their character while trying to make them look like I believe a housecarl would; strong, fierce. These are men and woman willing to give their lives to protect you. I wanted them to look determined, fierce, strong, hardened. I hope I achieved that.
Includes the five vanilla housecarls;
[list]
[*]Argis the Bulwark, Markarth
[*]Calder, Windhelm
[*]Iona, Riften
[*]Jordis the Sword-Maide, Solitude
[*]Lydia, Whiterun
[/list]Hearthfire Housecarls:
[list]
[*]Rayya, Falkreath
[*]Valdimar, Hjaalmarch
[*]Gregor, The Pale
[/list]
[b][size=3]REQUIREMENTS:[/size][/b]
No extra mods.
Hearthfire required for Hearthfire Housecarls.

[b][size=3]MODS USED:[/size][/b]
Mods I used when creating these facelifts;
[list]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869]Covereyes [/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28645]Nuska Real Skin for Women [/url](no longer available)
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3574]Gizmodian Scars [/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Better Males by Chris57 [/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Caliente's Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- [/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13377]Sporty Sexy Map - Athletic muscle mod [/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28946]Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture [/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27783]HN66s Long Eye Lashes [/url]
[/list]
[b][size=3]INSTALL:[/size][/b]
[list]
[*]Install : Use NMM or extract the files into the skyrim root folder manually. Make sure that the .esp is below mods that affect followers such as UFO
[*]Uninstall : Use NMM or delete all of the files manually.
[/list]
[b][size=3]COMPATIBILITY:[/size][/b]
My facelifts should be compatible with all mods, including follower overhauls, face/skin retextures, etc, etc. Just be sure to place the .esp at the end of the load order after all other companion mods.
author: RavenSylphe

files.name: Fierce Housecarls Base game Compilation
files.changelogHtml:
Added file for Rayya facelift. Other two Hearthfire housecarls to come soon.
Added file for Valdimar facelift; Gregor soon to come.
Gregor and Hearthfire Housecarl compilation files added; Completed
